# Introduction to BiocOpenCRAVA

The oc2bioc package incorporates the open-cravat python modules.
We can acquire the metadata for all OpenCRAVAT 'modules' in real time
using `populate_module_set`.

```{r setup}
library(oc2bioc)
modset = populate_module_set()
moddf = as.data.frame(modset)
library(DT)
datatable(moddf)
```
